mema goliya pariwarthanaya siyalu jathyanthara sabadatha kanapita gasuweya.sithala yuddhaya nomathi sandarbhayaka nobadi jathin yanna wikata yedumak bawata pathwiya.indiyawa badu sowiyat kadawure pathakayo eksath janapadaya samaga nyashtika sammuthinta elambaennata wuha.chinaya eksath janapadaye premaniya welada hawulkaruweku bawata rupantharanaya wiya.hadisiyema lokaya thani yayak bawata pathwiya.mema samathala thani yaye dakune sita uthuratath,uthure sita dakunatath pragdhanaya nidahase galayannata patan gaththeya.ekama goliya dhanawadi adhirajyayaka pradeshiya rajadhani sahitha sithiyamak lesa me anuwa loka deshapalana sithiyama aluth arthakathanayakata bhajanaya wiya.
